document.full_text: the lesbian family drama "the kids are all right," about a couple whose lives are disrupted when their children seek out their sperm donor dad, won glaad's outstanding film award on saturday.
document.title: "kids are all right," kim cattrall, honored by glaad
lines_and_colors: the lesbian family drama "the kids are all right," about a couple whose lives are disrupted when their children seek out their sperm donor dad, won glaad's outstanding film award on saturday.
